title: Duchess By Mistake
description: The Duke of Aldridge offers for Lady Elizabeth Upton, his best friend's sister, after a mix-up sends her to his bedchamber just when he emerges from his bath. Her scandalous behavior would shame her dear brother, the Marquess of Haverstock. She agrees to marry her childhood heart-throb, but former loves threaten to destroy their fragile marriage.
author: Cheryl Bolen
